sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react'; import Title from './components/title_bar'; import Navbar from './components/nav_bar'; import './pageOne.css'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {langStatus} from './components/redux'; export default function Home() { let varENG:string,varDEU:string const slctdLang = useSelector((state:langStatus)=>state.lang) if (slctdLang === 'ENG'){ varENG = 'block' varDEU='none' } else { varENG = 'none' varDEU='block' } return(
<Navbar pg_Home="4px solid red"/> <div className = 'newsbox_a'> <p style={{display:LangEN}}>News & Updates</p> <p style={{display:LangDE}}>Nachrichten & Updates</p> </div> <div className = 'newsbox_b'> <p style={{display:LangEN}}>In the prevailing circumstances, no activities has been planned....</p> <p style={{display:LangDE}}>Unter den gegebenen Umständen sind keine Aktivitäten geplant ....</p> </div> <div className = 'eventbox'> <p style={{display:LangEN}}>Upcoming Events</p> <p style={{display:LangDE}}>anstehende Veranstaltungen</p> <div className = 'grid_cont_event'> <div>Date</div> <div>Time</div> <div>Duration</div> <div>Event</div> <div>Date</div> <div>Time</div> <div>Duration</div> <div>Event</div> </div> </div> <div className = 'photobox'> <p className = 'photobox_txt' style={{display:LangEN}}>Recent events</p> <p className = 'photobox_txt' style={{display:LangDE}}>Neueste Veranstaltungen</p> <figure > <img className = 'photobox_img_a' src = {require('./images/cont_a.jpg')} alt='Pancake Tuesday Celebrations' /> <figcaption className='img_a_capt' style={{display:LangEN}}>Pancake Tuesday...<b>Read more....</b></figcaption> <figcaption className='img_a_capt' style={{display:LangDE}}>Veilchendienstag!....<b>lesen Sie mehr.......</b></figcaption> </figure> <figure > <img className = 'photobox_img_b' src = {require('./images/cont_b.jpg')} alt='New Year Celebrations' /> <figcaption className='img_b_capt' style={{display:LangEN}}>Welcoming 2020..<b>Know more..</b></figcaption> <figcaption className='img_b_capt' style={{display:LangDE}}>Ein gelungener Jahresauftakt..<b>Mehr wissen..</b></figcaption> </figure> <figure > <img className = 'photobox_img_c' src = {require('./images/cont_c.jpg')} alt='New Year Celebrations' /> <figcaption className='img_c_capt' style={{display:LangEN}}>Ghent, Belgium..<b>Explore..</b></figcaption> <figcaption className='img_c_capt' style={{display:LangDE}}>Ghent, Belgium..<b>Erkunden Sie..</b></figcaption> </figure> <figure > <img className = 'photobox_img_d' src = {require('./images/cont_d.jpg')} alt='New Year Celebrations' /> <figcaption className='img_d_capt' style={{display:LangEN}}>Bike safely..<b>Learn more..</b></figcaption> <figcaption className='img_d_capt' style={{display:LangDE}}>sicher radeln..<b>mehr Erfahren..</b></figcaption> </figure> <figure > <img className = 'photobox_img_e' src = {require('./images/cont_e.jpg')} alt='New Year Celebrations' /> <figcaption className='img_e_capt' style={{display:LangEN}}>Carnival at ICJ..<b>Details..</b></figcaption> <figcaption className='img_e_capt' style={{display:LangDE}}>Karneval im Club..<b>mehr Einzelheiten..</b></figcaption> </figure> </div > </div> ) }
